Package com.googlecode.gwt.charts.client.options

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Animation
    Animation Transition behavior settings.
    Annotations
    Annotations settings.
    AnnotationTextStyle
    Defines a text style.
    Axis
    An object with members to configure various axis elements.
    BackgroundColor
    A set of background color options.
    Bar
    Represents a bar in column/bar or candlestick chart.
    BoxStyle
    Controls the appearance of the boxes surrounding annotations.
    Bubble
    An object with members to configure the visual properties of the bubbles.
    Candlestick
    An object with members to configure the visual properties of the bubbles.
    CellColor
    A set of border color options.
    ChartArea
    An object with members to configure the placement and size of the chart area (where the chart itself is drawn, excluding axis and legends).
    Color
    A set of background color options.
    ColorAxis
    An object that specifies a mapping between color column values and colors or a gradient scale.
    ColorAxisLegend
    An object with members to configure various aspects of the legend.
    CoreOptions
    Common options for core charts.
    Crosshair
    An object containing the crosshair properties for the chart.
    CrosshairProperties
    An object containing the crosshair properties for the chart.
    Explorer
    The explorer option allows users to pan and zoom Google charts.
    Gradient
    Represents a gradient for use inside a BoxStyle.
    Gridlines
    An object with members to configure the gridlines on the horizontal axis.
    HAxis
    An object with members to configure various horizontal axis elements.
    Interval
    Intervals might be used to portray confidence, minimum and maximum values around a value, percentile sampling, or anything else that requires a varying margin around a series.
    Legend
    An object with members to configure various aspects of the legend.
    Options
    Common options for all charts.
    PointShape
    An object to configure various aspects of the point shape.
    SizeAxis
    An object with members to configure how values are associated with bubble size.
    Slice
    An object describing the format of a slice in a pie.
    TextStyle
    Defines a text style.
    Tick
    Tick object properties.
    Tooltip
    An object that specifies the tooltip style and behaviour.
    Trendline
    Trendline behavior settings.
    VAxis
    An object with members to configure various vertical axis elements.
    ViewWindow
    Specifies the cropping range of an axis.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    AggregationTarget
    Defines how multiple data selections are rolled up into tooltips.
    AnimationEasing
    The easing function applied to an animation.
    AxisTitlesPosition
    Where to place the axis titles, compared to the chart area.
    BarFormatColor
    A list of valid colors for BarFormat.
    ColoredLegendPosition
    Where to place the chart title, compared to the chart area.
    CrosshairOrientation
    The slider orientation.
    CrosshairTrigger
    The user interaction that causes the tooltip to be displayed.
    CurveType
    Controls the curve of the lines when the line width is not zero.
    Direction
    The direction in which the values along the axis grow.
    DisplayMode
    Defines types of maps for GeoChart.
    ExplorerAction
    Available actions for Explorer.
    ExplorerAxis
    The panning orientation.
    FocusTarget
    The type of the entity that receives focus on mouse hover.
    FormatType
    A quick formatting option for the date.
    IntervalStyle
    Interval style.
    LabelStacking
    Label stacking orientation.
    LegendAlignment
    Alignment of the legend.
    LegendPosition
    Where to place the chart title, compared to the chart area.
    MapType
    The type of map to show.
    MatchType
    Whether the control should match exact values only, prefixes starting from the beginning of the value or any substring.
    Orientation
    The slider orientation.
    PieSliceText
    The content of the text displayed on the slice.
    PointShapeType
    The shape of individual data elements.
    Resolution
    Defines the resolution of the map borders.
    ScaleType
    The type of scale (maximum and minimum values shown on the Y axis).
    SelectedValuesLayout
    How to display selected values, when multiple selection is allowed.
    SelectionMode
    Defines the selection mode.
    SeriesType
    The type of marker for a series.
    TextPosition
    Where to place the axis text, relative to the chart area.
    TitlePosition
    Where to place the chart title, compared to the chart area.
    TooltipText
    What information to display when the user hovers over a pie slice.
    TooltipTrigger
    The user interaction that causes the tooltip to be displayed.
    TrendlineType
    The type of trendline.
    ViewWindowMode
    Specifies how to scale the horizontal axis to render the values within the chart area.
